summary: The test package supplies pytest fixtures and a collection of unit tests that verify the core experiment management features of DVC, including stage mocking, experiment collection ordering, queue handling, executor status reporting for both Celery and workspace executors, removal of completed experiment tasks, and various utility functions such as reference handling, random name generation, and parameter conversion for Studio integration.
business_intent: Guarantee that DVC's experiment workflow operates correctly and robustly by automatically testing key components—fixtures, collection logic, executor status handling, queue cleanup, and supporting utilities—so that developers can detect regressions and maintain confidence in experiment functionality.
